global.title: Registration
global.captcha_help: Enter the registration code that you can see in the picture. Letter case does not matter.

messages.email_already_registered: Email already registered. Please use password recovery function or contact support.
messages.social_network_account_already_present: Current social network account is already registered. If you think it's a mistake, please, contact the support.
messages.wrong_captcha: Registration code was entered incorrectly. Please, try again.
messages.you_will_be_able_to_update_your_info_aft: You will be be able to update your account information info after registration.
messages.look_like_bot: Please, click here to confirm that you're not a bot.

password_hashed.helpText: No less than 3 and no more than 20 symbols.

photo.helpText: Format: gif, jpeg, png. Size: no more than 400 pixels.
